description: This file defines a React functional component 'MainContent' that renders different content based on the 'currentPage' prop. It includes import statements for React and related CSS styling. The component is designed to be used as part of a web application's frontend interface, serving as the main content display area.

methods.name: MainContent({ currentPage })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders different content depending on the 'currentPage' prop.
